languages.text: "Моя исповедь заставила вас тревожиться и тратить на меня свое время — я прошу прощения за это. Признателен вам за доброту". {n}Хормейстер горько улыбается.{/n}
"My confession made you anxious on my account, resulting in a waste of your time, for which I apologise. I am thankful for your consideration." {n}He smiles a bittersweet smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Моя исповедь заставила вас тревожиться и тратить на меня свое время — я прошу прощения за это. Признателен вам за доброту". {n}Хормейстер горько улыбается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "My confession made you anxious on my account, resulting in a waste of your time, for which I apologise. I am thankful for your kindness." {n}The Choirmaster smiles a bittersweet smile.{/n}
"My confession made you anxious on my account, resulting in a waste of your time, for which I apologise. I am thankful for your kindness." {n}The Choirmaster smiles a bittersweet smile.{/n}

"My confession made you anxious on my account, resulting in a waste of your time, for which I apologise. I am thankful for your consideration." {n}He smiles a bittersweet smile.{/n}
"My confession made you anxious on my account, resulting in a waste of your time, for which I apologise. I am thankful for your consideration." {n}He smiles a bittersweet smile.{/n}

languages.text: «Mi confesión le causó preocupación por mí, lo que le ha hecho desperdiciar su tiempo, y por ello pido disculpas. Agradezco el sentimiento». {n}Esboza una sonrisa agridulce.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My confession made you anxious on my account, resulting in a waste of your time, for which I apologise. I am thankful for your consideration." {n}He smiles a bittersweet smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi confesión le causó preocupación por mí, lo que le ha hecho desperdiciar su tiempo, y por ello pido disculpas. Agradezco el sentimiento». {n}Esboza una sonrisa agridulce.{/n}

languages.text: 「私の告白のせいであなたに心配をかけ、時間を無駄にさせたことを謝罪させて欲しい。その思いやりに感謝する」{n}男は、嬉しそうな悲しそうな笑みを浮かべる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My confession made you anxious on my account, resulting in a waste of your time, for which I apologise. I am thankful for your consideration." {n}He smiles a bittersweet smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私の告白のせいであなたに心配をかけ、時間を無駄にさせたことを謝罪させて欲しい。その思いやりに感謝する」{n}男は、嬉しそうな悲しそうな笑みを浮かべる。{/n}

languages.text: “我的告解让您为我担心，还浪费了您的宝贵时间，我为此致歉。感谢您的关心。”{n}他露出了苦乐参半的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My confession made you anxious on my account, resulting in a waste of your time, for which I apologise. I am thankful for your consideration." {n}He smiles a bittersweet smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我的告解让您为我担心，还浪费了您的宝贵时间，我为此致歉。感谢您的关心。”{n}他露出了苦乐参半的笑容。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr habt Euch meiner Beichte wegen um mich gesorgt und daher Eure Zeit vergeudet. Dafür entschuldige ich mich. Ich danke Euch für Eure Sorge." {n}Er lächelt wehmütig.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My confession made you anxious on my account, resulting in a waste of your time, for which I apologise. I am thankful for your consideration." {n}He smiles a bittersweet smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Euch meiner Beichte wegen um mich gesorgt und daher Eure Zeit vergeudet. Dafür entschuldige ich mich. Ich danke Euch für Eure Sorge." {n}Er lächelt wehmütig.{/n}

languages.text: « Je regrette que ma confession vous ait {mf|inquiété|inquiétée} et que vous ayez perdu votre temps par ma faute. Quoi qu'il en soit, je vous remercie de votre sollicitude. » {n}Il esquisse un sourire amer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My confession made you anxious on my account, resulting in a waste of your time, for which I apologise. I am thankful for your consideration." {n}He smiles a bittersweet smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je regrette que ma confession vous ait {mf|inquiété|inquiétée} et que vous ayez perdu votre temps par ma faute. Quoi qu'il en soit, je vous remercie de votre sollicitude. » {n}Il esquisse un sourire amer.{/n}

languages.text: "Günah çıkarmam, benim adıma sizi endişelendirmiş. Bu da vaktinizi boşa harcamanıza sebep olmuş ki bunun için özür dilerim. Düşünceli davranışınız için minnettarım." {n}Buruk bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My confession made you anxious on my account, resulting in a waste of your time, for which I apologise. I am thankful for your consideration." {n}He smiles a bittersweet smile.{/n}
